title: Trucker 2-HI2U
description:
HI2U!
     
    Trucker 2 (c) Play Publishing
     
    Release Date : ##date#
    Protection   : Steam
    Type         : Racing, Simulation
    Size         : 1 Disc
     
    Description:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~
     
    King of the Road is back! Trucker 2 lets you sit once again behind the wheel
    of a truck and race on American highways.
    Player can choose order of his missions. There are nearly 60 of them. You can
    chose one of 5 different trucks which can be upgraded and modified in your
    garage. Road's surroundings are destructible, and the damage is visible on
    cars. Damage affects car handling.
     
     
    Features:
     
     
    * 60 levels
    * 5 different types of trucks
    * 3 difficulty levels
    * realistic physic based on Nvidia PhysX engine
    * visible car damage
    * Large, beautiful locations
    * Tuning
    * Varying day time and weather conditions
    * Power-ups
    * Traffic and police
    * ability to use custom textures and HUD
    * steering wheels and game pad support
     
     
    Install:
    ~~~~~~~
    Unrar, mount/burn, install the game, copy crack and play!
